generate_parameters.write_species_params(filename, domains, domain_species, buffer_reactions=None, boundary_fluxes=None)[source]¶

Take lists of species parameters and write them to given outfile.

Parameters:
  • filename – str, name of outfile
  • domains – list of strings
  • domain_species – list of Species objects
  • buffer_reactions – list of BufferReaction objects
  • boundary_fluxes – list of Flux objects (RyR/SERCA)
